item.title: Aggressive Training
item.fluff: Your tactics are legendary for their devastating nature

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy hits you with a melee attack
EffectYou make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy.

item.title: Battle-Scarred Champion
item.fluff: Each scar marring your body recalls a past glory and the opponents who fell to your attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to your healing surge value.
Level 13+2 item bonus.
Level 23+3 item bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy bloodies you, but does not reduce you to 0 hit points or fewer
EffectYou make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy.

item.title: Beloved Performer
item.fluff: You are known for your daring escapades and your mocking wit

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and Bluff checks.
Level 11+2 item bonus.
Level 21+4 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy marks you
EffectThe triggering mark ends, and you shift 1 square.
Level 11This power can be used as an opportunity reaction instead.
Level 21This power is an encounter power instead.

item.title: Climb the Giant
item.fluff: You can climb up one side of huge foes and tumble down the other to land like a cat

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must be adjacent to a creature whose size category is larger than yours.

EffectYou shift up to 3 squares to a space that is adjacent to the larger creature. During the shift, you can enter the larger creature's space, and each square you shift into must be either adjacent to the creature or in its space.
Level 14Shift up to 4 squares.
Level 24Shift up to 5 squares.

item.title: Closed Mind
item.fluff: By erecting mental bulwarks, you ward yourself against hostile psychic attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 psychic.
Level 13Resist 10.
Level 23Resist 15.

item.title: Crimson Determination
item.fluff: You show no quarter to your enemies in their weakness

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against bloodied targets.
Level 14+4 bonus.
Level 24+6 bonus.
The bonus is halved for multiattacks.

item.title: Cunning Victor
item.fluff: You are a crafty warrior, and know how to exploit the whims of fate

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, skill check, or saving throw
EffectYou reroll the triggering roll or check until the result is something other than a 1.

item.title: Featherfoot
item.fluff: Your step is as light as a feather, almost like gravity's pull didn't have full effect on you

block.name: Property
block.line: When you make an Athletics check to jump, you considered to have a running start. If you already had a running start, you gain a +5 bonus to the check instead.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou spend an action point on your turn
EffectYou gain a fly speed equal to your speed until the end of your current turn.

item.title: Five Stars Arrow Deflection
item.fluff: Do not be fast; Do not be quick; Become the arrow before it strikes your flesh

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou move up to your speed.
While you keep one hand free, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against ranged Weapon attacks until the end of your next turn.
Level 13+4 power bonus.
While you have this bonus, you can use the following action:
Immediate Interrupt: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a ranged Weapon attack; The triggering enemy rerolls the triggering attack against a creature of your choice within 5 squares of you.
Level 23You can use this action as an opportunity interrupt instead.

item.title: Focused Static
item.fluff: You learn to project your thoughts to scramble your enemies' minds

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou score a critical hit against an enemy with a psionic power
EffectThe triggering enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Level 12A -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends) or until the end of your next turn, whichever is longer.
Level 22The triggering enemy's thoughts a scrambled (save ends). While its thoughts are scrambled, the enemy is dazed and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

item.title: Insightful Striker
item.fluff: You have been taught to watch for even the slightest weakness in any defense and to make the best of it

block.name: Critical
block.line: Once per turn, when you score a critical hit, you gain a bonus to the critical damage equal to the plus of this training.

item.title: Iron Hand Anvil Breaker
item.fluff: Move slowly to center your body, find the weakness in your target that will cause it to crumble, and then strike

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou move up to half your speed.
The first melee attack you make this turn deals 1d6 extra damage, or 2d6 extra damage against an unattended, inanimate object.
Level 123d6 against an inanimate object.
Level 222d6 extra damage, or 4d6 extra damage against an inanimate object.

item.title: Legacy Undying
item.fluff: So long as the Flame Imperishable exists, the soul of Nerath is kindled, and your faith in that inspires you and your allies to greatness

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 5 (you and each ally in the burst); Each target gains temporary hit points equal to the number of healing surges you have remaining. These temporary hit points last until the end of the encounter.
Level 12Twice the number of healing surges you have remaining.
Level 22Three times the number of healing surges you have remaining.

item.title: Mad Monkey Wobbles
item.fluff: Rule number one is to not get hit

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou move up to your speed and a minimum of 1 square. You have a +4 power bonus to AC and Reflex during this movement.
Level 14The bonus lasts until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Mental Block
item.fluff: Exposed to mind-rupturing magic for a prolonged time, you learned to block out the pain

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 psychic, and a +2 item bonus to saving throws against Charm or Fear effects.
Level 14Resist 10.
Level 24Resist 15

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are subject to a Charm or Fear effect
EffectYou make a saving throw against the triggering effect, even if it does not normally end of a save. On a success, you are not subject to the triggering effect.

item.title: Mercurial Mind
item.fluff: Focusing your thoughts allows you to move with blurring speed to stay one step ahead of your enemies

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are not bloodied, you gain a +1 item bonus to speed.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an unaugmented at-will attack power
EffectYou shift 2 squares.
Level 13Shift 4 squares.
Level 23Shift 6 squares.

item.title: Mystery of the Hidden Veil
item.fluff: Through misdirection and concealing magic, you obscure your spellcasting

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use an arcane power
EffectYou become invisible until the end of your next turn, and can shift 1 square.
Level 8Shift 2 squares.
Level 13Shift 3 squares.
Level 18Shift 4 squares.
Level 23Shift 5 squares.
Level 28Shift 6 squares.

item.title: Savage Spririt
item.fluff: When you draw on your inner reserves, your animal companion heartens, finding new vitality

headline.name: Requirement
headline.text: You must have an animal companion feature

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your second wind, your animal companion gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + this training's level. These temporary hit points last until the end of the encounter.

item.title: Southern Star Ring the Bell
item.fluff: Don't deceive yourself into thinking your reach ends with your fist - strike further, from within

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of y next turn, your reach increases by 1 for all melee attacks you make.
You move up to your speed, or shift up to half your speed.

item.title: Third Eye of Second Sight
item.fluff: You have a third eye that grants you the gift of second sight, whether you learned to open it yourself or were granted the ability by a patron

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: SpecialThis power has either the Arcane, Divine, Primal, Psionic, or Shadow keyword, depending on how you gained the boon.
TriggerAn attack hits you, but does not critically hit you
Level 18Hits you or an ally within 5 squares of you
Level 28The attack can be a critical hit
EffectThe triggering attack misses instead.

item.title: Unconquerable
item.fluff: You have a fearsome reputation as someone who can't be kept down, and you embrace it to your advantage

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy knocks you prone
EffectYou spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value, and can then stand from prone.

item.title: Warding Mind
item.fluff: Your hieghtened senses pick out thoughts and impulses from your foes, helping you react with speed and precision

block.name: Properties
block.line: The warding mind has the following properties:
While you are not bloodied, you gain a +2 item bonus to all defenses against triggered attacks.
While you are not bloodied, you gain a +3 item bonus to Acrobatics checks you make against other creatures.
Level 14+6 item bonus.
Level 24+10 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerOn your turn, you hit an enemy with an unaugmented psionic at-will attack power
EffectYou gain a +2 item bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.
Level 14+3 item bonus.
Level 24+4 item bonus.
